entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 6:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
